articles.title: IndiaMart InterMesh shares jump 8% after Q1 results and Rs 500 cr buyback announcement - Economic Times
articles.description: IndiaMart board has approved a proposal for a buyback of 12.5 lakh equity shares for an amount not exceeding Rs 500 crore. The buyback price is fixed at Rs 4,000, which is a 37% premium from the current levels.
